Name: context
column6: context required to set the parameter's value

Name: vartype
column6: parameter type (bool, integer, real, or string)

Name: source
column6: source of the current parameter value

Name: min_val
column6: minimum allowed value of the parameter (null for nonnumeric values)

Name: max_val
column6: maximum allowed value of the parameter (null for nonnumeric values)
